availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert S. Anderson (Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary V. Anderson. Father of Bell B. Anderson and Mary J. Anderson. Farmer in Trimble County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, p. 9.
Find A Grave, "Robert S. Anderson (August 29, 1822-November 21, 1895)," Memorial #83101797, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/83101797 (accessed August 3, 2018).
